channel.title: CVE Feed for Dell -- RVTools
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Dell -- RVTools

item.title: CVE-2023-44303|2024-08-02T19:59:51.950Z -- dell -- rvtools
item.description: RVTools, Version 3.9.2 and above, contain a sensitive data exposure vulnerability in the password encryption utility (RVToolsPasswordEncryption.exe) and main application (RVTools.exe). A remote unauthenticated attacker with access to stored encrypted passwords from a users' system could potentially exploit this vulnerability, leading to the disclosure of encrypted passwords in clear text. This vulnerability is caused by an incomplete fix for CVE-2020-27688.
